amendment.description: to correct the scoring for Project Bioshield.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2848 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2848 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2674-2675; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2674) to correct the scoring for Project Bioshield.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2848 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Byrd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2848 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
